attributes.action: Give Captain Tom Moore (99) knighthood for raising millions for the NHS.
attributes.additional_details:
To go through this much effort at his age, to succeed in raising such a mind-boggling amount of money for the NHS - and to make such a difference not only to the NHS staff but also to the country's morale,
- Captain Tom Moore surely deserves knighthood!

He beats - hands down - all our "clapping" for the NHS staff on Thursday nights, 
which pales into insignificance compared with this lovely man's determined action.

Knighthood is the least that the government can do to express our gratitude - which is surely due!
attributes.background:
At the start of this petition - he has single-handedly raised  £11m - and the donations are still pouring in from all over the world!

To read his biography (war hero!)
to check the latest total,
or to donate - visit the link below:

https://www.justgiving.com/fundraising/tomswalkforthenhs

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
